transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hello good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Sir Shadab bol raha hu sir IndiaMART se account manager.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir Sahil ji se baat ho rahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji Sahil ji aapne IndiaMART ka subscription liya hai na sir pichle din starting call kiya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir abhi aap so rahe hai kya?
Customer: Haan bhaiya thodi der baad me call kijiye na.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive called regarding IndiaMART subscription.

- Customer was sleeping and asked to call later.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, follow up, call
